original: Almqvist, Hjalmar Nikolaus, bankkamrer, Ulricehamn, f. 5/6/96 i Fux-erna, Älvsb. 1., av insp. N. A. o. Magda Ågren. G. 24 m. gymn:dir. Märta Larsson. Barn: Kerstin f. 25. — Lilla Edets priv:sk. 10-13. Res. t. Finl. 34, Norge 35. Löjtn. i trängens res. 44. Anst. i A-B Vänersborgsbanken fr. 13, kassör där 19, kamr. 27-42, kamr. v. A-B Sv. Hand :bankens kont. i Ulricehamn sed. 43. Led. av styr. f. A-B Sv. Hand :bankens kont. i Ulricehamn, ordf. i Ulricehamns skyttegille 29-36, i Ulricehamns gymn: fören. sed. 43, v. ordf. i Ulricehamns lav\^n-tenniskl. sed. 40, i Skidfrämj. lokalavd. sed. 44, i Ulricehamns bef :utb :fören. sed. 45, kassaförv. i S. Älvsb. 1. jaktv:fören. sed. 30, v. ordf. i Ulricehamns stads brandstyr. sed. 45, led. av Ulricehamns jaktskyttekl. styr. sed. 43, rev. o. sif-fergransk. i fören. Älvsb. 1. sjukhem sed. 38, rev. i Ulricehamns Tidn. A-B sed. 40. Hobbies: jakt o. skytte. Sv. jägarförb. hed :m. i guld, S. Älvsb. 1. jaktv:fören. förtj :SM, Skarab. landst :-förb. förtj :SM, Älvsb. skytteförb. förtj :SM.
translated: Almqvist, Hjalmar Nikolaus, bank clerk, Ulricehamn, born 5/6/96 in Fux-erna, Älvsb. 1., son of inspector N. A. and Magda Ågren. Married to gymnasium director Märta Larsson for 24 years. Children: Kerstin, born in 1925. Attended Lilla Edet private school from 1910 to 1913. Moved to Finland in 1934 and Norway in 1935. Lieutenant in the transportation service in 1944. Employed by A-B Vänersborgsbanken in 1913, promoted to cashier in 1919, and served as clerk from 1927-1942. Served as clerk for A-B Sv. Hand: bank's office in Ulricehamn since 1943 and is a member of the board. Chairman of Ulricehamns shooting guild from 1929-1936, chairman of Ulricehamns gymnastics society since 1943, vice chairman of Ulricehamns lawn tennis club since 1940, in the local branch of Skidfrämj (ski promotion) since 1944, in Ulricehamns military education association since 1945, treasurer of S. Älvsb. 1. hunting association since 1930, vice chairman of Ulricehamns city fire brigade since 1945, and member of the board of Ulricehamns hunting and shooting club since 1943. Auditor and accountant in Älvsb. 1. hospital association since 1938, and auditor for Ulricehamns newspaper A-B since 1940. Hobbies include hunting and shooting. Honorary member in gold of the Swedish Hunter Association, SM for S. Älvsb. 1. hunting association, SM for Skaraborg County Association, and SM for Älvsborg shooting association.

structured.name: Hjalmar Nikolaus Almqvist
honorificPrefix: Swedish Hunter Association Honorary member (gold medal)
